title: Towed -taled chile taqueritos cheese dice
ingredients: 1 Cream cheese pound or cheese in dice.
instructions: Step 1. Crush the taqueritos in a food processor.
Step 2. Pass the cheese cubes through the flour, egg and crushed taqueritos.
Step 3. Hot the oil to fry each of cubes or cheese dice.
Step 4. Remove them and remove excess oil and enjoy.
